title: Justin Bieber Drops New 'Sorry' Song - Full Audio & Lyrics
text: Check our your first listen of Justin Bieber‘s brand new song “Sorry”! The 21-year-old entertainer teamed up with Skillrex again for the track, which appears on his highly-anticipated upcoming album Purpose, dropping on November 13! PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Justin Bieber Also pictured: Justin steps out for the premiere of Ed Sheeran ‘s [...] »
